name: Pricing Table POP-UP Component
description:
Introduction:

This is a Pricing Table pop-up animation interactive component. Completely reusable and editable, you just need to update the content and you’re good.


What will you find in the file:

  • Responsive components (Pricing Table pop-up animation).
  • Stylized colors all across the file.


How To Use This File:

  • Make copy instances from the component.
  • Update them with your content.
  • Gather these instances as an auto-layout with center constraints.

 

Creating responsive reusable components is a key for successful and speedy prototypes, especially when there is no direct way to create something, that’s why I wanted to create this component and share it with you.
